# Interface: UsersAPI

## Methods

### get

â–¸ **get**(`id`, `query?`): `Promise`<[`User`](User.md)\>

Get a user by ID and optionally filter by query parameters.

#### Parameters

| Name | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `id` | `string` |
| `query?` | `Record`<`string`, `string`\> |

#### Returns

`Promise`<[`User`](User.md)\>
